summary.para: Specifies the action that a custom application domain manager takes when initializing a new domain.

content.para: These flags are used for property settings in the T:System.AppDomainManager class. The T:System.AppDomainManagerInitializationOptions flags apply only to custom application domain managers; they do not apply to the default manager. The M:System.AppDomainManager.InitializeNewDomain(System.AppDomainSetup) method in the default application domain manager does nothing. The default enumeration value is F:System.AppDomainManagerInitializationOptions.None.

summary.para: Register the COM callable wrapper for the current T:System.AppDomainManager with the unmanaged host.
